titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Supply Act of 1958 to provide for the funding of capital improvements at the Washington Aqueduct, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2299-2302)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 3/2/1994--Introduced. Amends the Water Supply Act of 1958 to allow the Chief of Engineers of the Army Corps of Engineers to borrow funds from the Federal Financing Bank to finance capital improvements at the Washington Aqueduct. Requires loan repayment by Aqueduct users.
